description.value:
Your cultured manner of speaking means that those you coerce are sometimes even impressed by your sheer force of will.

Prerequisites: Cha 17, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.Item.eveZktyLn2XmmBoK]{Veiled Threat}

Benefit: If you successfully overcome the Intimidate skill to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.6fqgiVqlA7u9jS4i#bully]{bully} a creature by 5 or more, after the duration of its helpful attitude ends, its attitude toward you becomes friendly rather than unfriendly.

Normal: Making a creature helpful towards you with Intimidate lasts for 1d6 × 10 minutes. At the end of this time, the creature’s attitude toward you becomes unfriendly.
